concept.title: Known Issues
concept.shortdesc: This topic lists known issues in Euca2ools 3.3.0.

conbody.p: Please contact Eucalyptus Support for known workarounds to these issues.

row.entry:
When an administrator uses HTTPS and doesn't enable certificate verification, running any command thereafter, will display the InsecureRequestWarning message.
Workaround: Use a valid certificate and set verify-ssl = true in the region's configuration, or use plain HTTP.
